CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 10, 1953, pg. 21 reads: "Home-Owners Now - A reasonable down payment and a long term in which to complete payments was one of the attractions which induced these people to participate in Belmar Gardens Co-operative."
TitMainTitle: Crowd of women, and men, including Mayor David L. Lawrence holding hat, gathered on site of Belmar Gardens for groundbreaking, with light colored tent, American flag, and trees
